abstract: South African Air Force bombs Lugh Ferrandi, Ital Somaliland
snippet: In the Epirus district enemy activities by infantry and tanks have been repulsed everywhere. The enemy sustained losses. Prisoners were taken. Irregulars are collaborating with the enemy....

headline.main: The Texts of the Day's Communiques on the War; Greek

lead_paragraph: In the Epirus district enemy activities by infantry and tanks have been repulsed everywhere. The enemy sustained losses. Prisoners were taken. Irregulars are collaborating with the enemy.
